attributes.action: realise his view, an hypocritical view, aligned to "all animals are equal, but some are more equal than others" in relation to gay marriage, doesn't wash!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Civil Partnerships are NOT marriage. Not only should all world citizens have the right to marriage: The UK Government continues to 'miss the point'.

Furthermore, the Government affirm their allegiance to ideological equality, by instutionalising a system of sexual apartheid?? 

When challenged, as over the 'gay blood' ban, arguably they show their true credentials by attempting to patronise and distract from the real issues.
 
Where is the integrity?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
